La_Mesa.Poinsettia Bowl: The Poinsettia Bowl was a post-season NCAA-sanctioned Football Bowl Subdivision college football bowl game played from 2005 to 2016. The game was originally played from 1952 to 1955 between military services teams; in 2005 it was re-created by the organizers of the Holiday Bowl. The new Poinsettia Bowls were played in late December each year at SDCCU Stadium in San Diego, California.
